bill.title: Physical Therapist Student Loan Repayment Eligibility Act of 2007
bill.summary: 2/16/2007--Introduced. Physical Therapist Student Loan Repayment Eligibility Act of 2007 - Amends the Public Health Service Act to: (1) include physical therapy within the definition of "primary health services"; and (2) make physical therapists eligible for the National Health Service Corps Loan Repayment Program (to assure an adequate supply of physical therapists among other health professionals).
